name: Constitution
description: Increases your Health Recovery by 4% for each piece of Heavy Armor equipped.   Current bonus: 0%.  You restore 108 Magicka and Stamina when you take damage for each piece of Heavy Armor equipped. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.   Current bonus: 0.
